text: Kid in class was signing “Hotline Bling” today and everyone was like “AWWWW MAAAN… NOW THAT’S GONNA BE IN MY HEAD ALL DAY."

lol when drake first dropped hotline bling, it was on ovosound radio (on apple music) and it was the same day he dropped/played his meek mill diss on there. so i tuned in looking to listen to the diss track, and hotline bling was playing, so i legit thought it was the diss track.
i was like “wow, drake rly would sing on a diss track”
haha. that’s funny because it COULD’VE been true
